document_data.caption: Map of Spiderhaunt Wood showing Lake Melishar.
document_data.name: Lake Melishar
document_data.mainbody: '''Lake Melishar''' was a clear, cool lake in the middle of the [[Spiderhaunt Wood]].

Geography.Flora & Fauna: The lake was known to be teeming with fish and the surrounding area was full of small wildlife like [[deer]], [[raccoon]]s, and [[rabbit]]s. [[Giant spider]]s were rarely seen here as they didn't like the light that shone in from the open area of the forest.

Features.[[Nature's Inn]]: A small cabin on the lake's shore.

document_data.History: This lake was named after an [[elven]] [[ranger]] that explored Spiderhaunt Wood in the [[:Category:13th century|13{{th}} century]], [[DR]].
